Thanks for playing!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4579334,"totalDownVotes":387205,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":135994,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":574269,"totalDownVotes":39015,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[🍀 + 🎃 EVENT] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":85776,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighters has a limited-time event, collect all the fighters before they're permanently gone!

Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2370517,"totalDownVotes":314416,"universeId":321778215,"name":"👻Royalloween👻 Royale High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":103703,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"High up on the hill sits a mysterious manor.. 
In celebration of your untimely visit, the Halloween festivities have been extended until Nov 15th!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1286590,"totalDownVotes":82075,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[HALLOWEEN P1] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":66450,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔷 Horseman Korashi:

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1106772,"totalDownVotes":76044,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🌊 SEA 3] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":80805,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔔 UPDATE 15 / BIGGEST UPDATE EVER OUT NOW
🌊 SEA 3: 9 new Fruits, new islands, new weapons, new secrets!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2000
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, Dragon, and Venom!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":584016,"totalDownVotes":127605,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🎃 [SEASON 2!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":79813,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":657323,"totalDownVotes":73177,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『🎃』Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":32581,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.885』 🏹✨

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":471607,"totalDownVotes":234141,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":32077,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4644784,"totalDownVotes":628959,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":28028,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏎 NASCAR is officially coming to Jailbreak SOON! Stay tuned!

Hi everybody! Our Fall Update is here!
🏁 Season 6! Race to the top! With easier contracts, more prizes!
💥 Seasonal Global Leaderboards!
🎉 Admin Commands for VIP-Servers!! Press "`" to activate. Type help in the command box for help!
🔥 Item dropping! Finally! Press backspace to drop.
🍁 Fall Map with improved lighting!
Thank you as always for supporting us! Use code fall2021 for some cash!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3402277,"totalDownVotes":437678,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":24370,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!
","genre":""},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":477425,"totalDownVotes":48895,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"Livetopia🧙 New Shop!","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":83191,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"____💡 UPDATE 26 💡____

A game by Rumble Studios.","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":452952,"totalDownVotes":75018,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":14852,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗
🔮A Universal Time (AUT) is an action/adventure game inspired by many different popular shows, games, and animes. Most notably the Shōnen Jump Anthology's 'JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'.

📰 Current news:
- RANKED SEASON 2.
- NEW GAMEMODE
- ADDED BROLY
- NEW 1V1S MAP

- NEW EMOTES
- NEW DASH ANIMATION, VISUAL CHANGES, ETC
- A LOT OF FIXES AND BALANCES

💼All models, animations, and scripts are created by the game's developers & owners 💼
🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2629175,"totalDownVotes":281159,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] The Haunting","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":45725,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Building
